en.title: FusionExcel Welcomes Quantum Pendant Wearer And Endorser Celebrity Philippines TV Host Cory Quirino!
en.content:
FusionExcel is proud to welcome Quantum Pendant Wearer and Endorser Philippines Celebrity TV Host, Newspaper Columnist and Wellness, Health and Beauty Guru, Cory Quirino, seen here with FusionExcel Founder CEO Paul Ting, Presidential Director Pastor Art Medina and FE Social Entrepreneur and President of the Center For Arts Foundation Philippines, Jerome Vinarao. 20 million viewers watch Cory’s TV show “A Good Life” every week in 45 countries around the world! 

Cory is the granddaughter of the late President Elpidio Quirino of the Philippines and shares FusionExcel's vision of building a global platform for social entrepreneurs to help the less fortunate of society. We are very proud to have a good-hearted person of Cory's stature with us who shares our vision and we look forward to a long and rewarding relationship together!

meta.description: FE is proud to welcome QP Wearer and Endorser Philippines Celebrity TV Host
meta.author: klhunter
